unpublishedAction.name: slack_automation_approved

actionConfiguration.body: {"text":{{"Hi <!channel> <!subteam^S02FF7AFS1J> <!subteam^S02GWJBFSEB>, Payment ticket approved. Please assign ticket for license extension if required, Code is - "+retailer_code_value.text + ". Created by "+payment_received_by_req.text + " & payment ID is " +payment_id_jd.text+ " & Payment type is "+payment_status.selectedOptionValue+", "+paytment_remarks.text+". Check retailer update for ideal days where current license_days is "+Form1.data.license_days_req+" and new ideal days will be "+Form1.data.current_ideal_days+". Remarks added from accounts team - " +payment_remarks.text +"." }}}
